sn36.11:4.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn36.11:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn36.11:4.4: “idha mayhaṃ, bhante, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
sn36.11:4.6: Sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
sn36.11:4.10: Kiṃ nu kho etaṃ bhagavatā sandhāya bhāsitaṃ:
sn36.11:5.2: Tisso imā, bhikkhu, vedanā vuttā mayā.
sn36.11:5.3: Sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
sn36.11:5.7: Taṃ kho panetaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhārānaṃyeva aniccataṃ sandhāya bhāsitaṃ:
sn36.11:5.9: Taṃ kho panetaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhārānaṃyeva khayadhammataṃ … pe …
sn36.11:5.15: Atha kho pana, bhikkhu, mayā anupubbasaṅkhārānaṃ nirodho akkhāto.
sn36.11:5.16: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā niruddhā hoti.
sn36.11:5.17: Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vitakkavicārā niruddhā honti.
sn36.11:5.18: Tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa pīti niruddhā hoti.
sn36.11:5.19: Catutthaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa assāsapassāsā niruddhā honti.
sn36.11:5.24: Saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca niruddhā honti.
sn36.11:5.25: Khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo niruddho hoti, doso niruddho hoti, moho niruddho hoti.
sn36.11:5.26: Atha kho, bhikkhu, mayā anupubbasaṅkhārānaṃ vūpasamo akkhāto.
sn36.11:5.27: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā vūpasantā hoti.
sn36.11:5.28: Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vitakkavicārā vūpasantā honti … pe …
sn36.11:5.29: saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca vūpasantā honti.
sn36.11:5.30: Khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo vūpasanto hoti, doso vūpasanto hoti, moho vūpasanto hoti.
sn36.11:5.32: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā paṭippassaddhā hoti.
sn36.11:5.33: Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vitakkavicārā paṭippassaddhā honti.
sn36.11:5.34: Tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa pīti paṭippassaddhā hoti.
sn36.11:5.35: Catutthaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa assāsapassāsā paṭippassaddhā honti.
sn36.11:5.36: Saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca paṭippassaddhā honti.
sn36.11:5.37: Khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo paṭippassaddho hoti, doso paṭippassaddho hoti, moho paṭippassaddho hotī”ti.
